effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user charges at the target
and may make it flinch.
It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
